## Q3 {-}
Solve for x:\

3.1. $\sqrt[4]{x-4}=5$\

3.2. $x^4=2^8$\

3.3. $x^{0.5}=23$\

3.4. $8^{2-x}=2^{4+3x}$\

3.5. $2^{3x}=10$\

3.6. $5^{3-x}=625$\

3.7. $7^{2-x}=4^{2x+3}$\

3.8. $16=8^{3-7x}$\

3.9. $e^{3-8x}-9=0$\

3.10. $e^{4-3x}+8=12$\

3.11. $\sqrt[3]{2^{4x}-4}=5$\

3.12. $\sqrt[3]{e^{2x}-13}=81^{\frac{1}{4}}$\

3.13. $\frac{5xa^{-7}b^{9}}{9a^2b^{-10}} = \frac{25b^{19}}{3a^9}$\
